thread.title: 'Star Wars' Metal Band Galactic Empire Streaming Debut Album [News]
thread.title_full: 'Star Wars' Metal Band Galactic Empire Streaming Debut Album [News]

title: 'Star Wars' Metal Band Galactic Empire Streaming Debut Album [News]
text:
'Star Wars' Metal Band Galactic Empire Streaming Debut Album The effort features numerous metal covers of music from the film series. UG editor. Music lover. Constant searcher of something interesting and unique. Posted a day ago 6 
Galactic Empire, the "Star Wars" themed metal band featuring producers/musicians Carson Slovak and Grant McFarland (also of Century fame), just released their self-titled new album through Rise Records. 
The whole is now available for streaming below. 
The band recently successfully crowdfunded $61,000 for the album and touring behind it. 22 hours ago in WTF? , 6 comments 3 a day ago in Community Feed , 1 comment 1 a day ago in Community Feed , 1 comment Trending stories 4 hours ago in Music news , 17 comments 19 13 hours ago in Music news , 26 comments 12 The crowd needs obese drunk stormtroopers yelling "play imperial march!" 4 My band are supporting them this Wednesday, we'll see if any come! 1 I liked this a lot more than I care to admit 1 Saw these guys in Brighton last night, worth every penny. Highly recommended. 1 I'm ashamed I didn't know about this gig 0 I wish Darth Vader was playing drums using the Force to move the sticks around. And some screaming from Kylo Ren. 1 Â© 2017 Ultimate-Guitar.com. All rights reserved About | Blog | TOS | Privacy | Advertise | Support B
